title: Oliver & the Good Gardener
description: Unity, Truth, and Love--Ingredients Necessary to Grow.In Oliver & the Good Gardener we follow an olive tree named, Oliver, whom the Good Gardner nurtured from a seed to a tall, beautiful tree. Yet, when bad Vulture takes advantage of the Good Gardener being out of the garden and lands in Oliver's branches, it's up to each of Oliver's branches to decide if they will listen to Vulture's lies or not.Will Oliver's branches believe the Good Gardener, or will some believe Vulture's lies? Can the Good Gardener bring unity, truth, and love back to the garden?Through this story children will not only learn how lies can divide and hurt, but how truth and love bring people together.
author: Patricia Lee
